rules_text:
As this land enters, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {G}.
flavor_text: [i]Most every wall, floor, and air space in the Grip is devoted to some kind of extreme sport.[/i]

if common: Gilded Grip
The Grip is an urban jungle where most every wall, floor, and air space is devoted to some kind of extreme sport.
